# AgentSkill Hub

AgentSkill Hub is a curated, searchable index of trending Claude Skill projects on GitHub.

## What this site provides
- A single place to discover popular Claude Skill repositories
- Search by repository name, owner, or description
- Detail pages with stars, forks, topics, and last update time

## Data sources and updates
- Source: GitHub Search API
- Sync: scheduled background job (typically hourly)

## Languages
- Chinese (zh) and English (en)
- “Claude Skill” is kept as the original term

## Key pages
- https://agentskill.work/
- https://agentskill.work/skills/{owner}/{repo}

## Contact
- https://agentskill.work/
